params.account: The address of the account holding the funds
params.spender: The address of the account spending the funds

approve(address,uint256).details: This will overwrite the approval amount for `spender` and is subject to issues noted [here](https://eips.ethereum.org/EIPS/eip-20#approve) It is recommended to use increaseAllowance and decreaseAllowance instead

params.amount: The number of tokens that are approved (2^256-1 means infinite)
params.spender: The address of the account which may transfer tokens

returns._0: Whether or not the approval succeeded

params.account: The address of the account to get the balance of

returns._0: Reward token balance that can be reinvested

deployStrategyFunds(uint256).details: Intended for use as part of an upgrade processDoes not affect `totalDeposits` nor mint receipt tokens

params.deadline: The time at which to expire the signature
params.r: Half of the ECDSA signature pair
params.s: Half of the ECDSA signature pair
params.v: The recovery byte of the signature

returns._0: Estimated rewards tokens earned for calling `reinvest()`

getSharesForDepositTokens(uint256).details: If contract is empty, use 1:1 ratioCould return zero shares for very low amounts of deposit tokens

owner().details: Returns the address of the current owner.

params.deadline: The time at which to expire the signature
params.r: Half of the ECDSA signature pair
params.s: Half of the ECDSA signature pair
params.v: The recovery byte of the signature
params.value: The number of tokens that are approved (2^256-1 means infinite)

recoverERC20(address,uint256).details: Cannot be used to recover deposit tokens

renounceOwnership().details: Leaves the contract without owner. It will not be possible to call `onlyOwner` functions anymore. Can only be called by the current owner. NOTE: Renouncing ownership will leave the contract without an owner, thereby removing any functionality that is only available to the owner.

revokeAllowance(address,address).details: Restricted to owner to avoid griefing attacks

params.amount: The number of tokens to transfer
params.dst: The address of the destination account

returns._0: Whether or not the transfer succeeded

params.amount: The number of tokens to transfer
params.dst: The address of the destination account
params.src: The address of the source account

returns._0: Whether or not the transfer succeeded

transferOwnership(address).details: Transfers ownership of the contract to a new account (`newOwner`). Can only be called by the current owner.

transferStrategyUpdaterRole(address).details: Set value to address(0) to disable the role and prevent future transfers

withdraw(uint256).details: If strategy is set, tries to withdraw from strategyIf strategy is NOT set, tries to withdraw from vault

Recovered(address,uint256).notice: Event emitted when Vault tokens are recovered

Reinvest(uint256,uint256).notice: Event emitted after reinvest. Used to track growth

PERMIT_TYPEHASH().notice: keccak256("Permit(address owner,address spender,uint256 value,uint256 nonce,uint256 deadline)");

allowance(address,address).notice: Get the number of tokens `spender` is approved to spend on behalf of `account`

approve(address,uint256).notice: Approve `spender` to transfer up to `amount` from `src`

balanceOf(address).notice: Get the number of tokens held by the `account`

checkReward().notice: Reward token balance that can be reinvested

deployStrategyFunds(uint256).notice: Deploy funds from Vault into a Strategy

deposit(uint256).notice: Deposit tokens to receive receipt tokens

depositOnBehalfOf(address,uint256).notice: Deposit on behalf of another address

getDepositTokensForShares(uint256).notice: Calculate deposit tokens for a given amount of receipt tokens

getSharesForDepositTokens(uint256).notice: Calculate receipt tokens for a given amount of deposit tokens

permit(address,address,uint256,uint256,u.notice: Triggers an approval from owner to spender

reinvest().notice: Reinvest rewards from staking contract to deposit tokens

strategyUpdater().notice: Admin role to update strategy (separate to `owner`)

sweepTokensFrom(address,address[]).notice: Sweeps tokens from Strategy to Vault

totalDeposits().notice: Total amount of `depositToken` managed by Vault

withdraw(uint256).notice: Withdraw deposit tokens by redeeming receipt tokens
